title: Tel-O-Fun
description:
Why walk or drive when you can ride? Now you can rent a bike in Tel Aviv! Forget about the traffic and looking 
for parking, and sign up to the Tel-O-Fun bike rental service.
Thousands of people rent bikes in London,Paris and Barcelona every day, and now you can too in Tel Aviv-Yafo. 
Tel-O-Fun offers hundreds of bikes for rent, at rental stations across the city, in a simple, efficient and convenient manner.
